revised_title: Novel Nitrogenous Compounds in the Phenyl and Benzoyl Series
tldr: The author investigates the reaction of nitrous acid on various nitrogenous compounds, such as picramic acid, benzamic acid, and phenylamine, leading to the discovery of new compounds like diazodinitrophenol and nitrophenylamine. These compounds have unique properties and chemical reactions, expanding the understanding of nitrogenous substances.
